Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the plant LTP family
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Plant non-specific lipid-transfer proteins transfer phospholipids as well as galactolipids across membranes. May play a role in wax or cutin deposition in the cell walls of expanding epidermal cells and certain secretory tissues. May possess an antifungal activity and protect the plant against pathogens.

Literature.Title: Resistance Function of rice lipid transfer protein LTP110.
Literature.Author: Ge X, Chen J, Li N, Lin Y, Sun C, Cao K.

Literature.Title: Collection, mapping, and annotation of over 28,000 cDNA clones from japonica rice.
